sqlMap.sql: select u.STOREIN_ID, u.STOREIN_NO, u.BILL_TYPE, u.FROM_BILL_ID, u.FROM_BILL_NO, u.TERM_ID, u.TERM_NO, u.TERM_NAME, to_char(u.SALE_DATE,'yyyy-MM-DD') SALE_DATE, u.SALE_PSON_ID, u.SALE_PSON_NAME, u.CUST_NAME, u.TEL, u.STOREIN_STORE_ID, u.STOREIN_STORE_NO, u.STOREIN_STORE_NAME, u.REMARK, u.DEAL_FLAG, to_char(u.DEAL_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') DEAL_TIME, u.DEAL_PSON_ID, u.DEAL_PSON_NAME, to_char(u.STATEMENUT_DATE,'yyyy-MM-DD') STATEMENUT_DATE, u.YEAR_MONTH, u.CRE_NAME, u.CREATOR, to_char(u.CRE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRE_TIME, u.UPD_NAME, u.UPDATOR, to_char(u.UPD_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') UPD_TIME, u.DEPT_ID, u.DEPT_NAME, u.ORG_ID, u.ORG_NAME, u.LEDGER_ID, u.LEDGER_NAME, u.STATE, u.DEL_FLAG from DRP_TREM_RETURN_STOREIN_A u
sqlMap.select: select count(0) cnt FROM DRP_TREM_RETURN_STOREIN_A u
sqlMap.insert: insert into DRP_TREM_RETURN_STOREIN_A( STOREIN_ID, CRE_NAME, CREATOR, CRE_TIME, UPD_NAME, UPDATOR, UPD_TIME, DEPT_ID, DEPT_NAME, ORG_ID, ORG_NAME, LEDGER_ID, LEDGER_NAME, STATE, DEL_FLAG )values( #STOREIN_ID#, #CRE_NAME#, #CREATOR#, sysdate, #UPD_NAME#, #UPDATOR#, sysdate, #DEPT_ID#, #DEPT_NAME#, #ORG_ID#, #ORG_NAME#, #LEDGER_ID#, #LEDGER_NAME#, #STATE#, #DEL_FLAG# )
sqlMap.update:
update DRP_TREM_RETURN_STOREIN_A
UPD_NAME = #UPD_NAME# UPDATOR = #UPDATOR# UPD_TIME = sysdate STATE = #STATE#
where STOREIN_ID = #STOREIN_ID#
sqlMap.delete: update DRP_TREM_RETURN_STOREIN_A set DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG# ,UPD_NAME=#UPD_NAME# ,UPDATOR=#UPDATOR# ,UPD_TIME=sysdate where STOREIN_ID = #STOREIN_ID:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: select u.STOREIN_ID, u.STOREIN_NO, u.BILL_TYPE, u.FROM_BILL_ID, u.FROM_BILL_NO, u.TERM_ID, u.TERM_NO, u.TERM_NAME, to_char(u.SALE_DATE,'yyyy-MM-DD') SALE_DATE, u.SALE_PSON_ID, u.SALE_PSON_NAME, u.CUST_NAME, u.TEL, u.STOREIN_STORE_ID, u.STOREIN_STORE_NO, u.STOREIN_STORE_NAME, u.REMARK, u.DEAL_FLAG, to_char(u.DEAL_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') DEAL_TIME, u.DEAL_PSON_ID, u.DEAL_PSON_NAME, to_char(u.STATEMENUT_DATE,'yyyy-MM-DD') STATEMENUT_DATE, u.YEAR_MONTH, u.CRE_NAME, u.CREATOR, to_char(u.CRE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRE_TIME, u.UPD_NAME, u.UPDATOR, to_char(u.UPD_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') UPD_TIME, u.DEPT_ID, u.DEPT_NAME, u.ORG_ID, u.ORG_NAME, u.LEDGER_ID, u.LEDGER_NAME, u.STATE, u.DEL_FLAG from DRP_TREM_RETURN_STOREIN_A u where u.STOREIN_ID = #STOREIN_ID#
sqlMap.sql: select u.STOREIN_DTL_ID, u.STOREIN_ID, u.FROM_BILL_DTL_ID, u.PRD_ID, u.PRD_NO, u.PRD_NAME, u.PRD_SPEC, u.BRAND, u.STD_UNIT, u.NOTICE_NUM, u.REAL_NUM, u.REMARK, u.PRICE, u.DECT_RATE, u.DECT_PRICE, u.DECT_AMOUNT, u.SPCL_TECH_ID, u.TAX_RATE, u.NO_TAX_DECT_PRICE, u.NO_TAX_DECT_AMOUNT, u.TAX_AMOUNT, u.YEAR_MONTH, u.PRD_TYPE, u.DEL_FLAG, a.SPCL_SPEC_REMARK, a.DM_SPCL_TECH_NO, a.SPCL_TECH_ID, a.SPCL_TECH_FLAG from DRP_TREM_RETURN_STOREIN_DTL_A u left join DRP_SPCL_TECH a on a.SPCL_TECH_ID = u.SPCL_TECH_ID and a.USE_FLAG = 1
sqlMap.insert: insert into DRP_TREM_RETURN_STOREIN_DTL_A( STOREIN_DTL_ID, STOREIN_ID, DEL_FLAG )values( #STOREIN_DTL_ID#, #STOREIN_ID#, #DEL_FLAG# )
sqlMap.delete: update DRP_TREM_RETURN_STOREIN_DTL_A set DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG# where STOREIN_DTL_ID in ($STOREIN_DTL_IDS$)
update DRP_TREM_RETURN_STOREIN_DTL_A set DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG# where STOREIN_ID = #STOREIN_ID:VARCHAR#
